Perform fuzz testing to catch security vulnerabilities or programmer mistakes during runtime testing.
Santiziers used: ASAN - detects memory errors such as use-after-free, double-free, out-of-bounds addressing of malloc, local/global variables LSAN - detects memory leaks TSAN - detects data races when reading and writing to shared multi-threaded variable is disallowed. UBSAN - detects null pointer or unaligned dereference, overflows, out-of-bounds shifts, out-of-bounds array access, divide-by-zero, and other undefined behaviors.
